actions.committee: House Committee on Merchant Marine and Fisheries
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Merchant Marine and Fisheries.

official_title: A bill to authorize an appropriation to the Secretary of the Interior for the repair and restoration of a certain road in Saint Marks National Wildlife Refuge.

summary.text: Authorizes the appropriation of $936,000 for the fiscal year ending September 30, 1977, for the repair of that portion of State Road 59 which passes through Saint Marks National Wildlife Refuge in Florida.

titles.title: A bill to authorize an appropriation to the Secretary of the Interior for the repair and restoration of a certain road in Saint Marks National Wildlife Refuge.
